text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1050. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The screen brightness is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS VivoBook K570ZD Laptop, 15.6" FHD IPS-level, AMD Quad Core Ryzen 5 2500U up to 3.6 GHz, GeForce GTX 1050 Graphics, 8 GB DDR4 RAM, 256 GB PCIe SSD, Wi-Fi 5, Fingerprint, Backlit KB!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Fortnite and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the ASUS VivoBook K570ZD Laptop, 15.6" FHD IPS-level, AMD Quad Core Ryzen 5 2500U up to 3.6 GHz, GeForce GTX 1050 Graphics, 8 GB DDR4 RAM, 256 GB PCIe SSD, Wi-Fi 5, Fingerprint, Backlit KB is solid, and the screen brightness is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 in the ASUS VivoBook K570ZD Laptop, 15.6" FHD IPS-level, AMD Quad Core Ryzen 5 2500U up to 3.6 GHz, GeForce GTX 1050 Graphics, 8 GB DDR4 RAM, 256 GB PCIe SSD, Wi-Fi 5, Fingerprint, Backlit KB is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
